name: Floppa shooter
description:
This is a game in which, when you press the "Start" button, you immediately get into the thick of things. You need to find a portal to get to the next level. Try to shoot the evil cats trying to get in your way! But it's not all that easy, the maze changes every few seconds, adding more walls, and the level gets harder with each time!

Left mouse button shooting

Control the arrows, or wasd
